original_text: She also bore Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah and the father of Gibea; and the daughter of Caleb was Achsah.
korean_text: 또 맛만나의 아버지 사압을 낳았고 또 막베나와 기브아의 아버지 스와를 낳았으며 갈렙의 딸은 악사더라

sentences.original_text: She also bore Shaaph the father of Madmannah,
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀��� 또한 마드만나의 아버지 사압을 낳았고,

sentences.original_text: Sheva the father of Machbenah and the father of Gibea;
and the daughter of Caleb was Achsah.
